alert.note: Alert for Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 21 at 1:11AM AKST until January 22 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero. * WHERE...Yukon Delta. * WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 6 PM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dropping temperatures combined with increasing winds today will produce wind chill values to 50 below.
info.instruction: A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.
